name: Create new records in Airtable from new contacts in ActiveCampaign
description:
This template periodically checks for new contacts in ActiveCampaign and uses the retrieved information to create new records in Airtable.

Your Airtable table should have at least these columns:
1) Email as email (as primary column)
2) Name as short text
3) Phone as number
4) ActiveCampaign ID as short text

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
